entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add a DequeueEnqueue method to the PriorityQueue Type #75070
  • [Bug]: At runtime sometimes the wrong overload is selected. #75069
  • AssemblyLoadContext is unloading or was already unloaded. #75067
  • Linq IntersectBy() just returns first item on same keySelector #75066

Closed

  • Test failure GC\\Scenarios\\muldimjagary\\muldimjagary\\muldimjagary.cmd #74541
    7.0.0
  • Dependency injection logging for analyzing the object creation number of times #41792
    Future
  • Mono crash in System.Net.Requests tests on linux-arm64 #74667
  • Test failure GC\\LargeMemory\\API\\gc\\keepalive\\keepalive.cmd #74731
    8.0.0
  • Task.Delay in UI app takes too long on macOS #75065
  • Runtime_72845 timing out in gcstress #73808
    8.0.0
  • Minimum .NET SDK version updated to 7.0.100 Preview 7 #73971
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Replace assert with BADCODE #75068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Add a few more riscv64 stubs in PAL #74793
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • System.Net.Requests: Pick correct RemoteExecutor overload in test #74994
    area-System.Net
  • Remove unnecessary LoaderHeap asserts #74995
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Simplify JitDisasm matching behavior #74430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Mark an F# test as GC stress incompatible #75001
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Add local build for System.Globalization shim #72896
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix undefined behavior issues in aarch64 #75029
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] add simd testing on ci #75064
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • add ability to set GCName via runtimeconfig. #74831
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Make OP_WASM_SIMD_SWIZZLE use the shufflevector LLVM ins… #75057
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono] Enable a bunch of System.Net tests on Windows #75010
    area-System.Net
  • Improve Span.Reverse fast path performance #70944
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix `Exp10M1(TSelf)` and `Round(TSelf, MidpointRounding)` #75063
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Change LibrariesConfiguration defaults in tests #75033
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Optimize the performance of InternalConfigurationRootExtensions.GetChildrenImplementation #74736
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Update Roslyn compiler build #75058
